data.title: Home
data.description: Carbon LDP is a Linked Data Platform for building web apps that manage and link data within your enterprise and across the World Wide Web.

data.title: About
data.description: Carbon LDP is a Linked Data Platform for building web apps that manage and link data within your enterprise and across the World Wide Web.

data.title: Documentation
data.description: Find all documents related to Carbon, from the basics concepts of Linked Data to the GUI.

data.title: Quick Start Guide
data.description: Quick start instructions to help you get up and running everything you need to work with CarbonLDP.

data.title: Essential Concepts
data.description: Basic Linked Data knowledge. Helpful documentation for a general overview of Linked Data.

data.title: Linked Data Concepts
data.description: General overview of the basic idea behind Linked Data and why it can make your applications more powerful.

data.title: REST API
data.description: Access and manage applications and data by URIs using RESTful requests over HTTP. Configure apps, schedule server-side jobs, execute queries - everything in Carbon is RESTful.

data.title: Getting Started with REST API
data.description: Guide to get you started. How to build an example application using the Carbon LDP REST API.

data.title: Interaction Models
data.description: An explanation of the way you can interact with the resources on the Carbon Server.

data.title: REST API Object Model
data.description: A summary of the various types of resources you can manage and interact with using REST.

data.title: JavaScript SDK
data.description: The JavaScript Software Developer's Kit, available from the npm package manager, allows you to manage RDF data using familiar JavaScript and TypeScript programming techniques and tools. Build for execution within a web browser or Node.js.

data.title: Getting Started with JavaScript SDK
data.description: Guide to install Carbon JavaScriptSDK and start creating and manipulating data with its basic methods.

data.title: Contexts
data.description: What is a context in Carbon JS SDK, how to declare, access and modify it.

data.title: JavaScript SDK Object Model
data.description: An in depth description of the Carbon Object Model.

data.title: Object Schema
data.description: What is the object schema, how to define and use it.

data.title: Uploading Files
data.description: How to upload, download and describe files

data.title: Authentication
data.description: Logging in, logging out and everything you need to know about it

data.title: Authorization
data.description: Granting or denying permissions to subjects on documents
